'''Weakened Wayob Manifestation''' is a quest-exclusive NPC that appears in the {{Quest|The Mystery of Tecoloapan Beach}}.

<!--Detailed story/lore information goes here.-->

===Appearance===
The Weakened Wayob Manifestation has the appearance of a [[Biting-Cold Wayob Manifestation]]. In the surface world in [[Tecoloapan Bay]], it manifested as an adult [[Iktomisaurus]].
